We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Sum _sum;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sum = SUM(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_sum.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "SUM Period", _sum.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "SUM Current", _sum.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sum = self.SUM(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.sum.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SUM Period", self.sum.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "SUM Current", self.sum.Current);
